definition: a telecommunication system that transmits images of objects (stationary or moving) between distant points
details:
noun
- a telecommunication system that transmits images of objects (stationary or moving) between distant points
= synonyms: television system
- an electronic device that receives television signals and displays them on a screen
= synonyms: television receiver
- broadcasting visual images of stationary or moving objects
= synonyms: video, telecasting, TV
